sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.$tblNm$_CD ,A.$tblNm$_SORT_NUM ,A.$tblNm$_DESC_TXT FROM $tblNm$ A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY $tblNm$_SORT_NUM

SELECT OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_CD ,OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_CATG_CD ,OLS.SRC_PRNT_VND_CD ,OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_NM ,OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_SORT_NUM FROM ORD_LINE_SRC OLS WHERE OLS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_CATG_CD = #ordLineSrcCatgCd#
AND OLS.SRC_PRNT_VND_CD = #srcPrntVndCd#
AND OLS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_SORT_NUM
SELECT CT.CONFIG_TP_CD ,CT.CONFIG_TP_DESC_TXT ,CT.CONFIG_CATG_CD FROM CONFIG_TP CT WHERE CT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY CONFIG_TP_SORT_NUM

SELECT OEA.ORD_ENTRY_ACT_CD ,OEA.ORD_ENTRY_ACT_DESC_TXT FROM ORD_ENTRY_ACT OEA WHERE OEA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
#ordEntryActcatgNmList[]#
AND OEA.LGSC_AVAL_FLG = 'Y'
AND OEA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY OEA.ORD_ENTRY_ACT_SORT_NUM

SELECT PCES.RTL_SWH_CD , S.RTL_SWH_DESC_TXT
FROM PRC_CALC_EXCL_SWH PCES, SWH S WHERE PCES.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PCES.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND PCES.GLBL_CMPY_CD = S.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PCES.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PCES.RTL_SWH_CD = S.RTL_SWH_CD
